name: Dodge It! Jam Edition
description:
Hello, this is my game for the weekly game jam. I've actually already made a game similar to this (that's why this one has "Jam Edition" in the name) but the game was powered by Godot. Godot is an amazing engine, but I found it to be too heavy for such a light and simple game, so I took the idea and rewrote it with a lighter framework: Love2d. Unfortunately with the lack of time I've been having, I've barely been able to put much effort into the project, I was only able to get a run-able version up and going and wasn't able to polish it. Since the game is light and utilizes mouse, mobile should be supported, although I haven't tested it.

All you do in the game is to click to mouse to make the player jump, don't go below the screen and don't touch the white objects or it's game over! although that cute lookin' circle thing might be useful.....

Feel free to post your best score in the comments!
